description_thought: Selected content from https://aperturevc.com/ based on its comprehensive overview of the firm's mission and values.
description: Aperture Venture Capital is dedicated to supporting the Multicultural Mainstream™, aiming to transform the venture landscape for diverse entrepreneurs through an ecosystem designed for successful exits. The firm addresses systemic biases in venture capital with its Diversity Investing API℠, fostering community, trust, and speed in engagements. Aperture VC's founders bring 25 years of experience in venture capital, corporate investing, and angel investing, having mentored hundreds of founders nationwide.
